channel.title: !~Compiler Help~!
channel.description:
[size=18pt][font=comic sans ms]Okay, when I try andrun my compiler, it says this
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
In my compiler, i have this
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit
I have JDK 6 Update 21 (jdk1.6.0_21)
What should my compiler look like? Please help![/font][/size]
I have windows XP if thats any help..

item.title: !~Compiler Help~!
item.dc:creator: @Frostfire Frostfire
item.description:
@Frostfire wrote:

[size=18pt][font=comic sans ms]Okay, when I try andrun my compiler, it says this

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

In my compiler, i have this

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is
about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

I have JDK 6 Update 21 (jdk1.6.0_21)

What should my compiler look like? Please help![/font][/size]

I have windows XP if thats any help…

Read full topic
